friend works!

Id Age Name
{{friend.id}} {{friend.age}} {{friend.name}}
import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-friend', templateUrl: './friend.component.html', styleUrls: ['./friend.component.css'], }) export class FriendComponent implements OnInit { friends: any; constructor(private http: HttpClient) {} ngOnInit() { let response = this.http.get('http://localhost:8080/api/v1/friends'); response.subscribe((data) => (this.friends = data)); } }
